Configuration for docker


$ docker --version
Docker version 17.12.1-ce, build 7390fc6
$

$ docker version
Client:
 Version:	17.12.1-ce
 API version:	1.35
 Go version:	go1.9.4
 Git commit:	7390fc6
 Built:	Tue Feb 27 22:13:43 2018
 OS/Arch:	linux/amd64
Cannot connect to the Docker daemon at unix:///var/run/docker.sock. \
Is the docker daemon running?
$

$ docker info
Cannot connect to the Docker daemon at unix:///var/run/docker.sock. \
Is the docker daemon running?
$
